title: Early Success of Meta's Threads Is Already Drawing Interest From Advertisers
description: In less than 24 hours, the app has signed up more than 30 million users, surged to the top of download charts and become a trending topic on Twitter.

title: Japan's Plan to Become a Chipmaking Champ Hinges on This Startup
description: Rapidus is looking to invest about $35 billion to manufacture 2-nanometer chips and work with the U.S. to counter China’s ambitions.

title: The Ultimate Outdoor Concert Survival Kit: 7 Things You Should Never Leave at Home
description: As venues have tightened their rules about what you can bring in, the risk of being turned away at the door has grown. Here, an approved packing list.

title: Threads vs. Twitter: What's the Difference?
description: The Instagram-linked app joins the crowded microblogging fray. Here’s how it compares with Twitter.

title: AI Boom Stems Tech's Downturn
description: Excitement over artificial intelligence is proving to be a powerful counterforce for a tech economy that had been slowing, lifting share prices and growth outlooks at many giants—and igniting new startups.
